name: Super Market Bobo
description:
Some whale is manipulating the markets and Bobo's short order is getting wrecked. Stomp out or avoid the bulls, crabs, slurppers and apes, track this whale down and teach him the valuable lesson that what goes up MUST come down.

Controls ActionGame boy
KeyboardMove
D-PadArrow KeysTalk/InspectUpUpJumpBXAttackAZ
